comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: scalarchives.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://scalarchives.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fscalarchives.com) ### Comment > When I try to access scalarchives.com, which is a legit website, I get a AdGuard DNS warning and I can’t access the website. Unfortunately in the app under recent activity it doesn’t look like the site is blocked. (See screenshots) > Anyways, website needs to be unblocked in my opinion. > Thanks ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/comg4v5fk1csgkgw40wscwkks4wgskwhjylgvhlxwg.png?nc=1)

issue.title: com.imo.android.imoim.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://com.imo.android.imoim.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcom.imo.android.imoim.com) ### Comment > Вылазит реклама в приложении imo для android. В начале звонка и после него. > com.imo.android.imoim > ``` Username: @vertexx ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/86ljwuagxf48o80oswksoc0444g0gskmxgqlrn7idc.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/gz1b96ru67wc4s4488884cgw44o048g1xox3n50scc.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12.2 System version: | `Android 16` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `quic://dns.adguard-dns.com`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:

AdGuard Russian Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12.2&system_version=Android+16&browser=chrome&browser_detail=&filters=19.208.21.22.20.2.18.4.11.3.14.15.1&dns_servers=quic%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=false&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=4320&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid&dns.timeout=5000)

comment.body:
@Alex-302 в самом приложении ничего точно не нажимал. Да и вообще реклама появляется только в этих двух случаях. Если нажать на три точки, то там просто написано Hide AD и при нажатии на неё блок с рекламной пропадает. Я добавил вот эти правила и вроде бы реклама ушла:
||up.ousaqb.tech^$app=com.imo.android.imoim
||mmp.shopee.com.my^$app=com.imo.android.imoim
||bstream.channelcom.tech^$app=com.imo.android.imoim
Скорее всего помогло последнее. Пока наблюдаю ещё.
